channel.title: [317] title screen problem help plz![317]
channel.description:
Source: Delta
I don't know why my client does this but it say I want to put a new picture in as the client background it always flips it it's really wierd the default picture this client came with was this: [img]http://i797.photobucket.com/albums/yy257/xxDANxx1/title-1.png[/img]
and that doesn't flip when I load the client up. I really want to put a new picture as the background but it always flips please help me :(

item.title: [317] title screen problem help plz![317]
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

Oh…This. My friend made a background for me, in GIMP.

I tried it, it was flipped like that too. When you make it, you have to flip it, so in PAINT, GIMP, PHOTOSHOP, whatever, it looks flipped to you, but in the Client it’s the right size.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] title screen problem help plz![317]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

I don’t have that in my client

Read full topic

item.title: [317] title screen problem help plz![317]
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Find:

aRSImageProducer_1110.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(382, 0); aRSImageProducer_1111.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-255, 0); aRSImageProducer_1107.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(254, 0); aRSImageProducer_1108.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(180, -371); aRSImageProducer_1109.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(180, -171); aRSImageProducer_1112.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(382, -265); aRSImageProducer_1113.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-180, -265); aRSImageProducer_1114.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(254, -171); aRSImageProducer_1115.initDrawingArea();In your client class and comment it out or remove it.

Read full topic

item.description:

use ctrl + f to search.
